review.reviewBody: The Chicken Biryani was so tasty same as evething I ordered from there like non veg thali ,veg & chicken pakora:except the Mango Shake it was not sweet more like sour
The food was delicious and fresh..thankyou...
Best Wallet Friendly restaurant with Tasty and Quality food
Love chana bhatura of this place. Absolutely Yum.
Excellent food and sweets especially Channa Bhatura
